TopicTitle: Key release on authorised key resellers

Articles.Content:
Update: GamesPlanet now have keys!

I am wondering when game keys are going to be released to authorised key resellers like GamesPlanet and CDKeys?
I visited GamesPlanet this morning, since I am going to purchase the game through them since I won a £50 voucher for the store. I had the game wishlisted since announcement, but when I visited the page it was just producing a 404 error. So I contacted GamesPlanet through their support email.
The chain is as follows:

Quote

ME:
Hello,

Can you please explain why Kerbal Space Program 2 has been removed from the listings on your website? The game has been listed since it was announced and I have had it on my wishlist since then too.
Now the game's page shows a 404 error and the game in my wishlist shows £99 purchase price! I was going to use your site to purchase it since I have enough money in my account wallet.

Thanks in advance,

GP:
"Publisher's distributor wasn't able to provide us with keys for the release and currently we are awaiting further updates. In this situation we've decided to remove the product from sale for now until we know more".

Having re-checked, my GamesPlanet wishlist now shows the game back at standard price but clicking on its link still produces the 404 page, indicating that they haven't received the keys yet.
I've also checked CDKeys and it seems that they have yet to receive any keys either.

Edited February 24, 2023 by apsims
Update on availability
